title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate nine-button frock coat] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate nine-button frock coat] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 7.6 x 6.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
